content.text: Match ends, Valencia 2, Espanyol 1.
Second Half ends, Valencia 2, Espanyol 1.
Goal!  Valencia 2, Espanyol 1. Juan Mata (Valencia) header from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ricardo Costa with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Raúl Baena.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Marius Stankevicius.
Attempt missed. Jesús Dátolo (Espanyol) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Juan Forlín following a fast break.
Offside, Espanyol. Javi Chica tries a through ball, but Álvaro Vázquez is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Joan Verdú (Espanyol) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio García.
Attempt blocked. Sergio García (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Joan Verdú.
Offside, Valencia. Pablo Hernández tries a through ball, but Vicente is caught offside.
Foul by Luis García (Espanyol).
Éver Banega (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Pablo Hernández (Valencia) left footed shot from very close range is just a bit too high.
Attempt missed. Luis García (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Luis García (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Éver Banega (Valencia).

Foul by Hedwiges Maduro (Valencia).
